title: Successful participation in the International Federation of Automatic Control World Congress (IFAC) 2023.
description: Attending the IFAC conference and delivering a presentation on stage was an incredibly enriching experience for us. The opportunity to connect with experts from different parts of the world and share the knowledge was truly invaluable. The IFAC conference provided a platform for us to showcase our research and work to a global audience. The feedback and discussions we received from fellow participants allowed us to refine our ideas and explore new perspectives. We are grateful for the opportunity and look forward to applying the insights gained to further contribute to the advancement of our field.
